janadhipathiwaraya wisin oba shri lankawe agramathya dhurayen iwath kirimen pasuwa thawaduratath ema thanathurehi ra`di sitimata darana uthsahaya wyawastha wirodhi wana athara eya rata thula barapathala deshapalana asthawarathwayak nirmanaya kirimata hethuwana bawa sa`dahan karanu kamaththemu.

mu dan top eka hodata akkage kimbe thol uda athullanawa.akkage as piyawenawa.tikak wela mehema karala mu eka paratama payiya athulata bassuwa.akkata “aah” kiyawuna.mu eka paratama payiya athulema thiyeddi akkage aga uda diga wela akkage thol deka uranna gaththa.

mema adahas wasara dahasak pamanama abhiyogayata lak nowini.[82][85] purwa-nuthana[sanskaranaya] kiritaka saha puppusiya sansarana paddhathi pilibanda paranithama wartha hamuwanne 1242di prakashitha ibn al-nafisge awisennage granthaye wyuha widyawa pilibanda wiwaranaya thula ya.[86]

ek manawa sampath prajawak wenuwen sampath beda ganima saha ihala pahala ha madhyaya yana siyalu dishawan kara adahas sanniwedanaya yana karunu matha apage watinakama padaka wiya yuthu bawa apa handanagena atha.

dayasge upayamargika salasume kendriya kotasa wuye anagatha demala wiplawaya mada pawathwima sandaha uthuru pradeshaya watala enam mannaram disthrikkaye arippu, marichchikatti, paleyi saha thalwapadu yana pradesha wala da yapanaya disthrikkaye punarin haraha kareyinagar, palali, peduru thuduwa saha alimankada da, wawuniya disthrikkaye mulathiwu walada (ewakata mulathiwu wawuniya disthrikkaye kotasak wiya) saha nagenahira thrikunamalaye da hamuda kandawuru walallak athi kirimaya.

nelumwilaekthara iridawaka maradane dumriya sthanaya asala bas nawathumata wi basayak enathuru bala sitiyemi.wenath bas ratha paminayath mata wuwamana basaya paminiye natha.rajakariyata adala raswimata pama nowi ya yuthu bawin ma pasu wuye tharamaka no iwasilleni.basaya kerehi wu wishwasaya bindina.
santhruptha medaya adangu aahara lesa kiri, kiri nishpadana, mas, mas aashritha nishpadana, pol, polkiri, polthel aadiya gatha haka.
yonisomanasikaraya ha dhammanudhamma patipadawa ape abhyantharaya ha bandunu sadhaka dekak.

nidasunak lesa, fesbukhi kisiyam liyamanakata dakwena prathichara wigraha kara ganimen pasu e් ha anukulawa thawath mano widyathmaka anthargathayan nirmanaya kala haki ya.

janawari 08 wanidata masa thunakata pera jiwitha tharjana nothaka yahapath deshapalana peraliyak wenuwen abhitha thirana gath shri lanka nidahas pakshayema hirunikalata mese nam , eeta dirgha kalayakata pera sita jiwitha tharjana nothaka prajathanthrawadaya udesa eekadhipathi wiyaruwa parajaya kirima wenuwen katayuthu kala nirmal ranjith dewasirilata pahara dena wita nasu kan athiwa bala sitimata janawari 08 wiplawaye jayagrahakayan kriya kirima arumayak wiya nohaka.
